an3.132:4.3: Pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo, pathavilekhūpamo puggalo, udakalekhūpamo puggalo.
an3.132:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an3.132:4.6: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an3.132:4.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pāsāṇe lekhā na khippaṃ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:4.8: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an3.132:4.9: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an3.132:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an3.132:5.3: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an3.132:5.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pathaviyā lekhā khippaṃ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:5.5: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṃ kujjhati.
an3.132:5.6: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṃ anuseti.
an3.132:6.1: * Katamo ca, bhikkhave, udakalekhūpamo puggalo?
an3.132:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo āgāḷhenapi vuccamāno pharusenapi vuccamāno amanāpenapi vuccamāno sandhiyatimeva saṃsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:6.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udake lekhā khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:6.4: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo āgāḷhenapi vuccamāno pharusenapi vuccamāno amanāpenapi vuccamāno sandhiyatimeva saṃsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:6.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
